column1: Question,Correct Answer,Wrong Answer 1,Wrong Answer 2,Wrong Answer 3
Which method creates a database connection?,DriverManager.getConnection(),Connection.create(),Database.connect(),JDBC.getConnection()
Which interface represents a database connection?,Connection,Statement,ResultSet,DriverManager
Which method executes SELECT queries?,executeQuery(),executeUpdate(),execute(),runQuery()
Which interface is used for parameterized queries?,PreparedStatement,Statement,CallableStatement,ParameterizedStatement
Which method moves ResultSet cursor to next row?,next(),moveNext(),advance(),nextRow()
Which method rolls back a transaction?,rollback(),undo(),revert(),cancel()
Which method retrieves int from ResultSet?,getInt(),getInteger(),readInt(),fetchInt()
Which interface executes stored procedures?,CallableStatement,PreparedStatement,Statement,StoredProcedure
Which method executes INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE?,executeUpdate(),executeQuery(),execute(),runUpdate()
Which JDBC interface represents SQL statement?,Statement,Connection,ResultSet,Query
Which method commits a transaction?,commit(),save(),persist(),execute()
Which method closes a Connection?,close(),dispose(),destroy(),terminate()

What happens with getConnection() parameters?
Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mydb", "user", "password");,Connection established with credentials,Compilation error,URL only required,SQLException always
Which interface represents query results?,ResultSet,Statement,Connection,QueryResult
